web_snippets: Kate Summerscale (born 2 September 1965) is an English writer and journalist. She is best known for the bestselling narrative nonfiction books The ...
Kate Summerscale was born in London in 1965 and lived in Japan, England and Chile as a child. She graduated with a double-first from the University of Oxford.
Kate Summerscale is the author of the number one bestselling The Suspicions of Mr Whicher, winner of the Samuel Johnson Prize for Non-Fiction 2008.
